lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Sunday about the Rangers’ 2-1 victory over the Flyers in front of a small crowd in Philadelphia referred incorrectly to the Rangers’ general manager, Glen Sather. Mr. Sather was at the arena for the entire game; he did not make it to the arena late in the second period because of the snowstorm.
